Name: Applesinth
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Hints of apple and liquorice combine to make a very moreish cocktail.
History: Created in 1999 by Alex Kammerling in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Applesinth contains 182 calories
